content: Hello, I am Vishal. I am a student. I really like the Rust language. I would like to contribute to the rust compiler. I am very fascinated about the Query System in rustc. I would like to help with the same or anything, for that matter.
I am new to Open Source contributing but I am eager to help.
@cjgillot is there something easy for a beginner to help with? or something harder that has vague instructions?

Hi @Vishal Dalwadi, welcome. I don't have beginner issues with the query system on hand. The long-term problems with the query system are the compilation time, the runtime performance, and parallelization.
This is closely tied with the incremental compilation work, you may want to check on the incr-comp working group. You may also want to check on the salsa project (https://github.com/rust-lang/salsa), which will replace rustc's custom query system eventually.
Thank you @cjgillot I will do the same. Meanwhile, I will try to help with bug fixes.
